state: Get ready to pick stuff up and put it in places, because you've just entered TextWorld! Here is how to play! First stop, venture east. After that, make an attempt to go to the east. And then, travel south. And then, head east. Following that, attempt to go to the south. Then, make an attempt to venture west. Then, travel south. And then, attempt to take a trip east. That done, travel east. With that over with, try to take a trip north. With that done, make an effort to move north. And then, make an attempt to go to the north. With that accomplished, make an effort to take a trip west. Okay, and then, retrieve the licorice strip from the floor of the dish-pit. Got that? Good! -= Washroom =- You are in a standard kind of place. That is to say, you're in a washroom. You decide to just list off a complete list of everything you see in the room, because hey, why not? You see a cabinet. Is this it? Is this what you came to TextWorld to see? a cabinet? You can make out a trunk. Look over there! a box. You can make out a counter. But oh no! there's nothing on this piece of trash. Aw, here you were, all excited for there to be things on it! There is an open passageway leading east. There is an unblocked exit to the north. > -= Washroom =-0/1
